info.title: Pehea e pā'ani ai - How to play
info.description: E koho i ka hua ma {tries} hoʻāʻo. Ma hope o kēlā me kēia hoʻāʻo, e loli ka waihoʻoluʻu o nā papa e hōʻike ai i ka pili o kāu hoʻāʻo i ka hua.
info.correctExample: Aia ka hua L ma ka hua a i ka wahi pololei.
info.presentExample: Aia ka hua O ma ka hua akā ma kekahi wahi ʻē.
info.absentExample: ʻAʻole ka hua N ma ka hua ma kekahi wahi.

about.title: No Kēia Nane Hua'ōlelo
about.description: He kope kēia o ka pāʻani Wordle i hoʻololi ʻia no {language} e
about.customize: a hoʻololi no kekahi ʻōlelo ʻē! Ua lawe ʻia nā hua no kēia Wordle mai
about.playOriginal: pāʻani i ka mea kumu ma ʻaneʻi
